name: dashlit
description: Dashlit is a minimalist dashboard for collecting and displaying custom metrics, built for developers and homelab users. It supports widgets, Markdown, and embeds, designed for low-overhead setup and rapid data visualization.

features.title: Custom Metrics
features.description: Display any data you want to track. Flexible visualization

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Build dashboards with modular components. Compose your view

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Add formatted text and documentation. Rich content display

features.title: Embed Support
features.description: Include external content and services. Unified dashboard

features.title: Low Overhead
features.description: Minimal setup and resource usage. Quick deployment

features.title: Developer Friendly
features.description: Built for technical users and homelab enthusiasts. Speaks your language
